DOC.brief_summary: Omitting evaluation gastric residual content prior feed premature infant increase feed intake 2 week , total caloric intake growth 3 week , well decrease time require parenteral nutrition .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Not Measuring Gastric Residual Content On Feeding Tolerance In Premature Infants iNFANTS
DOC.detailed_description: Infants randomize 2 group . Group 1 gastric residual evaluate prior feed . Group 2 gastric residual evaluate prior feed . Nutritional outcome compare group .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age le 32 week , Birth weight less equal 1250 gram , Initial feeding tolerate within 48 hour life Congenital chromosomal disorder , Severe complication lead death first week life
